member.getMemberByIdAndPassword: SELECT MEMBER_ID , NICK_NAME , PASSWORD , EMAIL FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND PASSWORD = ?
member.addNewMember: INSERT INTO MEMBERS ( MEMBER_ID , NICK_NAME , PASSWORD , EMAIL ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? )

article.getAllArticleList: SELECT A.* , NICK_NAME FROM ARTICLE A , MEMBERS M WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY ARTICLE_ID DESC
article.getDetailArticle: SELECT A.* , M.NICK_NAME FROM ARTICLE A , MEMBERS M WHERE A.ARTICLE_ID = ? AND A.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID
article.addHits: UPDATE ARTICLE SET HITS = (HITS+1) WHERE ARTICLE_ID = ?
article.addRecommends: UPDATE ARTICLE SET RECOMMENDS = (RECOMMENDS+1) WHERE ARTICLE_ID = ?
article.writeArticle: INSERT INTO ARTICLE ( ARTICLE_ID , MEMBER_ID , TITLE , DESCRIPT ) VALUES ( ARTICLE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
article.updateArticleOnlyTitle: UPDATE ARTICLE SET TITLE = ? WHERE ARTICLE_ID = ?
article.updateArticleOnlyDescription: UPDATE ARTICLE SET DESCRIPT = ? WHERE ARTICLE_ID = ?
article.updateArticle: UPDATE ARTICLE SET TITLE = ? , DESCRIPT = ? WHERE ARTICLE_ID = ?
